IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_guild_member_withdraw') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_member_withdraw GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_member_withdraw @character_id dbo.id_t, @withdraw BIGINT, @reset_withdraw_at BIGINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Guild_Members SET reset_withdraw_at = @reset_withdraw_at, day_withdraw = @withdraw WHERE character_id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
